<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Grovel](/Feats.aspx?ID=1277) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 14 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

With obsequious words and begging gestures, you convince your foe you're less of a threat. You attempt to [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=48) against a creature. Unlike a normal Feint, the creature can be within 30 feet instead of in your melee reach, and you make your check against its Will DC instead of its Perception DC.
